<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Slink](/Feats.aspx?ID=2505) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can move through gloom with the speed of darkness. You can move 5 feet farther when you take the [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) action, up to your Speed. In addition, as long as you continue to use Sneak actions and succeed at your Stealth check, you don't become [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27) if you end a Sneak action in dim light or darkness, as long as you have cover or greater cover or are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) at the end of your turn.
name: Slink
